title: Valeri Masalitin
text:
Valeri Nikolayevich Masalitin (; born 27 September 1966) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er. 
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1983 for <a href="FC%20Salyut%20Belgorod">FC Salyut Belgorod</a>.
He scored 5 goals in one game, which is a joint record of the <a href="Soviet%20Top%20League">Soviet Top League</a> (in 1990 for <a href="PFC%20CSKA%20Moscow">PFC CSKA Moscow</a> in a game against <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a>).
